original: @36a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @36a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tsarya drishti aa nu ta phanna tva ta bh'a ba na n'a ma /
analyzed: tsarya drishti aa nu ta phanna tva ta bh'a ba na n'a ma /
translated: Caryadristianutpanna-tantavatbhavanama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: lta spyod skye med kyi bsgom pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: lta spyod skye med kyi bsgom pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Meditation of the Non-arising View and Conduct

original: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Gurus

original: sems nyid stong pa skye med yin //
analyzed: sems nyid stong pa skye med yin //
translated: The empty mind itself is non-arising.

original: de nyid ma bcos chos nyid de //
analyzed: de nyid ma bcos chos nyid de //
translated: That itself is the unfabricated dharmata.üîΩThat also is inseparable.

original: de yang dbyer med lta ba rtogs //
analyzed: de yang dbyer med lta ba rtogs //
translated: The view is realized.

original: sgom las ma 'das pa ni smra //
analyzed: sgom las ma 'das pa ni smra //
translated: It is said that meditation is not beyond that.

original: zhen med rnal 'byor rang sar spyod //
analyzed: zhen med rnal 'byor rang sar spyod //
translated: The yogi without attachment practices in his own place.

original: phyogs bcur re med 'bras bu yin //
analyzed: phyogs bcur re med 'bras bu yin //
translated: The result is without hope in the ten directions.

original: de la mi re chags pa spyad //
analyzed: de la mi re chags pa spyad //
translated: Practice without hope in that.

original: rang bzhin nyams skyes ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyams skyes ngo mtshar che //
translated: The arising of the natural experience is wondrous.üîΩPan

original: pa na ha ni smra bar byed //
analyzed: pa na ha ni smra bar byed //
translated: is said.

original: gnyis @36b med ye shes rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: gnyis @36b med ye shes rtogs pa yin //
translated: The realization of nondual wisdom

original: bde chen bdud rtsi bdag gis 'thungs //üîΩkunydza na'i breng bas mgul pa brgyan //
analyzed: bde chen bdud rtsi bdag gis 'thungs // kunydza na'i breng bas mgul pa brgyan //
translated: is the nectar of great bliss that I drink.üîΩThe throat is adorned with the garland ofüîΩkunj√±as.

original: lo ma'i sham thabs brtan par chings //
analyzed: lo ma'i sham thabs brtan par chings //
translated: The firm leaf skirt is worn.

original: myos bas nags kyi gseb tu 'khyam //
analyzed: myos bas nags kyi gseb tu 'khyam //
translated: Intoxicated, I wander in the forest.

original: bdag nyid pa na ha ngo mtshar mthong //
analyzed: bdag nyid pa na ha ngo mtshar mthong //

original: pu ri ma lar bdag po lnga //
analyzed: pu ri ma lar bdag po lnga //
translated: In Purimavara there are five lords,

original: gcig dang mi 'brel ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: gcig dang mi 'brel ngo mtshar che //

original: mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas su ni //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas su ni //

original: me tog ldum ra rgyas par byed //
analyzed: me tog ldum ra rgyas par byed //

original: de ni ge sar 'jib par byed //
analyzed: de ni ge sar 'jib par byed //
